relaxRecovery: Relaxation and recovery right in your space.
aureaCrates: Aurea creates not just an interior, but a unique atmosphere that adds prestige, style, and perfection to your everyday life.
built_in_sauna_description: A built-in sauna is the best way to create a small spa area in your own space.
homeAboutDesc: Our company specializes in the production and installation of outdoor jacuzzis and saunas, as well as built-in saunas. Our goal is to offer customers high-quality, durable, and safe products that fully comply with modern standards and individual needs.
createyourSpace: Create a wellness spa center in your space
aurea_goal: Aurea's goal is not only to create products, but also to create an environment that improves your life – helping you relax, restore energy, and create unforgettable memories.
aurea_team: Our team brings together experienced craftsmen and engineers who work with innovative materials and modern technologies. Each project is created according to your wishes – from design to final installation.
safe_eco: Compliance with safety and environmental standards
sauna_open_description: Sauna in open space is a unique way to relax in harmony with nature.
sauna_open_description1: Imagine an environment where everything is perfectly designed for your peace and relaxation. An open-air sauna does not require an enclosed space and can be freely placed in the yard, garden, cottage or hotel area. Our saunas, made of environmentally friendly materials, are not only a place to relax, but also a lifestyle that will make your everyday life special.
sauna_projects_description: Compact sauna that will soon become a new favorite room and gathering place in the garden. Space for 4-6 people
